privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.p1: Your privacy is important to us. It is darkstackdev's policy to respect your privacy regarding any information we may collect from you across our website, darkstackdev.
privacyPolicy.p2: We only ask for personal information when we truly need it to provide a service to you. We collect it by fair and lawful means, with your knowledge and consent.
privacyPolicy.p3: We only retain collected information for as long as necessary. We protect it within commercially acceptable means to prevent loss, theft, and unauthorized access.
privacyPolicy.p4: We donâ€™t share any personally identifying information publicly or with third-parties, except when required to by law.
privacyPolicy.p5: Our website may link to external sites that are not operated by us. Please be aware that we have no control over the content and practices of these sites.
privacyPolicy.commitment1: Not to engage in activities that are illegal or contrary to good faith.
privacyPolicy.commitment2: Not to spread racist, xenophobic, or anti-human rights content.
privacyPolicy.commitment3: Not to cause damage to the physical and logical systems of the site.
privacyPolicy.moreInfoText: This policy is effective as of June 22, 2025.

Footer.aboutText: A community that will revolutionize everything in programming development. The community of programmers made for programmers.
Footer.newsletterText: Get the latest updates on our technology.

AccountProvidersPage.securityTipText: Keeping multiple providers linked ensures you always have access to your account, even if one of them is temporarily unavailable.
AccountProvidersPage.unlinkConfirm: Are you sure you want to unlink your GitHub account?
